qas.question: What happened after Kanye made his controversial statement?

answers.text: Rick Kaplan cut off the microphone and then cut away to Chris Tucker

qas.question: Who did Kanye West say doesn't care about black people?

context: Myers spoke next and continued to read the script. Once it was West's turn to speak again, he said, "<a1_0>George Bush<a1_0/> doesn't care about black people." At this point, telethon producer <a0_0>Rick Kaplan cut off the microphone and then cut away to Chris Tucker<a0_0/>, who was unaware of the cut for a few seconds. Still, West's comment reached much of the United States.
